title: Google Adds Multi-Layered Defenses to Secure GenAI from Prompt Injection Attacks
description: Google has revealed the various safety measures that are being incorporated into its generative artificial intelligence (AI) systems to mitigate emerging attack vectors like indirect prompt injections and improve the overall security posture for agentic AI systems.
